text: Pamiris are a group of Iranian ethnic groups, who live mainly in the Badakhshan of Tajikistan and Afghanistan, Hunza and Chitral regions of Pakistan and the far western portion of Xinjiang in western China. They speak the Pamiri languages of the Iranian language family. == Ethnic groups == Following is the list of Pamiri ethnic groups: * Wakhi people * Shughni people * Sarikoli people *Mukhbani peoople == Related pages == * Tajik people * Iranian people == References == Category:Ethnic groups in Pakistan Category:Ethnic groups in China Category:Ethnic groups in Afghanistan Category:Ethnic groups in Asia
title: Pamiri people
